summary: I like to imagine OSEX being it's own game. I'd like you to think that to, because it's a lot funner. Custom Voice Acted followers for the characters coming soon.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]I like to imagine OSEX being it's own game. I'd like you to think that to, because it's alot funner. Custom Voice Acted followers for the characters coming soon. If I convinced you to give OSEX a shot, tutorials on How to install and how to use are at the bottom.

Thanks CEO For [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69448/?]OSEX[/url][/size][center][/center][center][size=5]LATEST UPDATE!
